content.en: Parkinson's diagnosis: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms and machine learning to improve the diagnosis of Parkinson's disease and related disorders. By analyzing MRI and diffusion-weighted imaging data, these algorithms aim to accurately classify different parkinsonian syndromes, such as Parkinson's disease, progressive supranuclear palsy, and multiple system atrophy. The goal is to reduce diagnostic errors, enhance diagnostic performance, and develop automated approaches that can assist clinicians in making more accurate and timely diagnoses.
content.da: Parkinsons diagnose: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer og maskinlæring for at forbedre diagnosen af Parkinsons sygdom og relaterede lidelser. Ved at analysere MRI- og diffusionsvægtede billeddata sigter disse algoritmer mod at klassificere forskellige parkinsonske syndromer nøjagtigt, såsom Parkinsons sygdom, progressiv supranukleær parese og multipel systematrofi. Målet er at reducere diagnostiske fejl, forbedre diagnostisk ydeevne og udvikle automatiserede metoder, der kan hjælpe klinikere med at stille mere præcise og rettidige diagnoser.
